titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Card 1: Isherwook (!) Card 3: under May 1, left column <*> illegible... Card 4: top line R...<*> Illegible

body.ab:
1938 Princess Bassiano 4 rue de Cirque - Paris XIIIe Nov 12 - On the Frontier: W.H. Auden & C. Isherwook <*> 60 - Public Speech: A. MacLeish 40 - New Whitney Autumn '38 60 - Townsman 8 - New Verse 12 - Poetry 12 total 192
Nov 12 - Left deposit of 50 v on Family Reunion T.S. Eliot Ordered Nov. 12 Family Reunion to appear in Spring Wrote P.B. Nov 17 notifying her of publication data
sent bille Mar 19 wrote Mar 30 saying Eliot's book arrived phoned May 11 no one answered Elysees 81-54
forward 192
June 26 1939 The Still Centre 60 Journey to a War 125 Louis MacNeice 60 2 New Verse 24 Criterion 106 Richardson vol 1 85 Pale Horse ordered 105 Family Reunion 75 June 26 1939 paid by cheque 826
forgot to deduct fifty francs deposited Nov 12. 38 sent 50 frs with parcel 1939 June 27
July 6 delivered Pale Horse at house (already paid for)
Oct 25 T S Eliot: Practical Cats 45 1940 post " Idea of a Christian Society 66 Jan 4 3.20 V. Woolf Rev Reviewing 111 6 12. Dec 31 39 received cheque Frs. 111, 1940 Jan 6 New Writing No 3 82 V. Woolf Reviewing 7 8
1939 Princess Bassiano Palazzo Caetani, Rome ------ cheque Dec 31 1939 (dated Dec 20) Frs 111 " Jan 23 1940 ( " Jan 18) 500 " April 30 1940 ( " April 25) 1.000
Oct 25 T.S. Eliot: Practical Cats 45 Jan 6 1940 T.S. Eliot Idea of a Christian Society 66 " No 3 - New Writing 82 " V. Woolf: Reviewing (Hogarth Pamphlet) 7 postage 15 20 Jan 17 Amber Innocent by Joan Easdale 60 Shakespeare Anthology The Ages of Man 87 50 Sitwell: Escape with me 137 50 Jan 23 subscription Horizon 6 mos Post 16 Jan 25 How green was my valley, Richard Llewelyn 65 Patrick M.Synge, Plants with Personality 110.00 140 post 20 Feb 11 Julian Bell Essays Poems & Letters 137,50 - 11 Chin P'ing Mei @75,00 post 28,00 March 13 Enemies of Promise 128 post 10
April16 Country Notes, V. Sackville-West 151,25 post 16 May 1 Horizon No 1 & post 20 <*> L'Amour et l'Occident, D de Rougement 27 post 7 50 6 New English Weekly of March 21st 10 post 3 50
